name: Buzz! Junior: Ace Racers
synopsis: Buzz! Junior: Ace Racers for PlayStation 2, a wacky kids' racing game that adults will love too! This easy-to-grasp, fun-packed game, allows players to use their Buzz! buzzers to race a variety of vehicles across land, sea and air, as well as bash their buzzers to compete in fun-fuelled mini-games. It's motor-racing fun for all the family, and just in time for Christmas.
